name: part_010
file: tmp_大神ミオ５周年記念ライブ『ナイトループ』【 ホロライブ ⧸ 大神ミオ 】 [YqPVwYLcvrY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio performs the song 'Sirius' on stage.
Ending credits sequence featuring the song 'Night Loop'.
A hand-written message from Ookami Mio is displayed on screen.

subtitles.original: さよなら
subtitles.english: Farewell.

subtitles.original: こぼれた涙は
subtitles.english: The tears that overflowed

subtitles.original: 君がゆく あの空を飾るよ
subtitles.english: will adorn the sky you travel to.

subtitles.original: 迷わないように
subtitles.english: So that you don't get lost,

subtitles.original: 輝いてて
subtitles.english: keep on shining.

subtitles.original: いつまでも 忘れない 君を
subtitles.english: I'll never forget you,

subtitles.original: 想うよ
subtitles.english: I'm thinking of you.

subtitles.original: 明日も
subtitles.english: Tomorrow too,

subtitles.original: 歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll sing.

subtitles.original: 明日は
subtitles.english: Tomorrow...

subtitles.original: 逢いたい 願うほどに
subtitles.english: The more I wish I could see you,

subtitles.original: 僕らまた 巡り合う 今で
subtitles.english: the more we meet again in this moment.

subtitles.original: おやすみ
subtitles.english: Goodnight.

subtitles.original: 相変わらず上ばかり見て おかしくなるやりきれなさ 持っていく
subtitles.english: Looking up as always, carrying the unbearable feeling that's driving me crazy.

subtitles.original: 責任かけっこ 焦りに背を向け 色褪せた過去とやり合ってんだ
subtitles.english: Playing tag with responsibility, turning my back on impatience, I'm struggling with the faded past.

subtitles.original: 押さえつけるほどに嵩を増していく 劣等感その他諸々
subtitles.english: The more I suppress it, the more it grows: inferiority complex and all that.

subtitles.original: 溺れる前に夜を染め上げなきゃ
subtitles.english: Before I drown, I must dye the night.

subtitles.original: 敵じゃない方で決め込んで 不満散歩詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Assuming it's not the enemy, stuffing in my walking dissatisfaction.

subtitles.original: 叩き割ったらバカ増える ひとつも ひとつも 飲み込めないくらい
subtitles.english: If I smash it, fools increase, to the point I can't swallow even one, not even one.

subtitles.original: ほら暮れてやるよ 悔いも全部 ちゃんと噛んで味わいながら
subtitles.english: Look, I'll give it to you, all the regrets, while chewing and tasting them properly.

subtitles.original: 感想聞いてみてもいいですか か か
subtitles.english: Can I ask for your thoughts?

subtitles.original: 期待飛んでいけないグループだ そう上がれるまで
subtitles.english: It's a group where expectations can't fly away, yeah, until we can rise.

subtitles.original: 嫌い嫌いもどうしようもないから もう飾らないで
subtitles.english: Since hate is unavoidable, don't dress it up anymore.

subtitles.original: あと少しで届く希望の境界線
subtitles.english: The borderline of hope that's just a little bit further.

subtitles.original: 背伸びすれば届きそうな頂上さ
subtitles.english: A summit that seems reachable if I stretch.

subtitles.original: いつも応援してくれている ミオファのみんな 本当にありがとう
subtitles.english: To all the Miofa who always support me, thank you so much.

subtitles.original: 5周年ありがとう！！
subtitles.english: Thank you for the 5th anniversary!!

subtitles.original: ここまでとても短く感じた位、駆け抜けた5年間でした。
subtitles.english: It's been a 5-year sprint, feeling so short until now.

subtitles.original: 今、私がホロライブに居られるのは君の応援があったお陰だよ。
subtitles.english: The reason I can be in Hololive now is thanks to your support.

subtitles.original: 本当に、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Truly, thank you.

subtitles.original: これからもいっぱい、一緒に楽しもうね♡
subtitles.english: From now on, let's have fun together a lot, okay?

subtitles.original: 大神ミオ
subtitles.english: Ookami Mio
